title: Ham hock and pea soup
description: A luxurious version of ham and pea soup using poached ham hock and a judicious dash of cream.
ingredients: 1 head garlic, cut in half horizontally
1 large bunch flatleaf parsley, roughly chopped
150ml/5fl oz double cream, plus extra to serve
1 long baguette, cut in half lengthways, then widthways
